items.sentence: Tom and I used to do a lot of things together.
Tom and Mary are expecting their second child.
Tom and Mary are finally going to get married.
Tom and Mary ate the whole cake by themselves.
Tom and Mary built a sand castle on the beach.
It must\'ve been difficult for Tom to do that.
I may not be able to cope with those problems.
I often think about the place where I met you.
I overslept and was not able to catch the bus.
I prefer reading books to watching television.
